alerts.markdown:
#####Upcoming changes:

We are improving the way we publish economic statistics in a number of ways:

We are publishing related data at the same time under new "theme" days. This will increase the coherence of our data releases and involve minor changes to the timing of certain publications, including TOPSI.  

For more information on this, please see [Changes to publication schedule for economic statistics][1].



  [1]: https://www.ons.gov.uk/news/news/changestopublicationscheduleforeconomicstatistics
